content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

1. What is the Current Market Regime?
RISK-ON: low volatility (Vol: 23.9%) with mixed breadth (3/8 sectors positive), supporting cyclical leadership but participation is narrow.

2. Which sectors are leading?
Heavy Industry ABOVE TREND: EREGL (1W: +8.65% | 1M: +14.68%) ABOVE TREND is driving the pack; Banking & Finance ABOVE TREND: YKBNK (1W: +3.10% | 1M: +7.18%) ABOVE TREND is steady; Energy & Chemicals RECOVERY: SASA (1W: +2.07% | 1M: -5.00%) RECOVERY shows short-term bounce vs weaker 1M.

3. Which sectors are lagging?
Technology & Telecom BELOW TREND: TCELL (1W: -5.70% | 1M: -1.28%) BELOW TREND, Retail & Food BELOW TREND: ULKER (1W: -5.07% | 1M: -7.49%) BELOW TREND, and Construction & REIT BELOW TREND: TKFEN (1W: -13.69% | 1M: -5.21%) BELOW TREND are under pressure.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

4. Top Performing Stocks?
EREGL (1W: +8.65% | 1M: +14.68%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +8.21% | 1M: +10.98%) ABOVE TREND, TRALT (1W: +6.83% | 1M: +2.95%) ABOVE TREND, KRDMD (1W: +6.27% | 1M: +8.54%) ABOVE TREND, YKBNK (1W: +3.10% | 1M: +7.18%) ABOVE TREND.

5. Worst Performing Stocks?
TKFEN (1W: -13.69% | 1M: -5.21%) BELOW TREND, HEKTS (1W: -7.88% | 1M: -10.06%) BELOW TREND, SOKM (1W: -7.21% | 1M: -1.54%) BELOW TREND, KCHOL (1W: -6.86% | 1M: -3.39%) BELOW TREND, KONTR (1W: -6.28% | 1M: -6.19%) BELOW TREND.

6. Momentum Stocks?
EREGL (1W: +8.65% | 1M: +14.68%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +8.21% | 1M: +10.98%) ABOVE TREND, TKFEN (1W: -13.69% | 1M: -5.21%) BELOW TREND, HEKTS (1W: -7.88% | 1M: -10.06%) BELOW TREND, SOKM (1W: -7.21% | 1M: -1.54%) BELOW TREND.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

7. Banking Sector Outlook?
Banking & Finance is ABOVE TREND with selective strength; AKBNK (1W: +2.04% | 1M: +1.29%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +1.52% | 1M: +1.52%) ABOVE TREND, ISCTR (1W: +0.54% | 1M: +4.00%) ABOVE TREND and YKBNK (1W: +3.10% | 1M: +7.18%) ABOVE TREND are the preferred idiosyncratic longs.

8. Industrial Sector Outlook?
Heavy Industry is ABOVE TREND but heterogeneous: EREGL (1W: +8.65% | 1M: +14.68%) ABOVE TREND and KRDMD (1W: +6.27% | 1M: +8.54%) ABOVE TREND lead, while FROTO (1W: -4.45% | 1M: +3.39%) CORRECTION signals short-term profit taking in autos.

9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?
Energy & Chemicals is in RECOVERY with dispersion: TRMET (1W: +8.21% | 1M: +10.98%) ABOVE TREND and TRALT (1W: +6.83% | 1M: +2.95%) ABOVE TREND outperform, while TUPRS (1W: -1.40% | 1M: -12.04%) BELOW TREND remains weak.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

10. Portfolio Recommendation?
Risk-on stance: overweight Heavy Industry and selective banks, trim Technology, Retail and Holdings exposure; add on pullbacks in high-conviction cyclicals and lock gains on overbought names.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?
EREGL (1W: +8.65% | 1M: +14.68%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +8.21% | 1M: +10.98%) ABOVE TREND, YKBNK (1W: +3.10% | 1M: +7.18%) ABOVE TREND, TKFEN (1W: -13.69% | 1M: -5.21%) BELOW TREND, HEKTS (1W: -7.88% | 1M: -10.06%) BELOW TREND for volatility-led opportunities.

12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?
Heavy Industry, Banking & Finance, and Construction & REIT â€” watch leadership sustainability and whether weak sectors continue to bleed or stabilize.

13. Key Levels & Triggers?
Watch XU100 behavior around the 20-day moving average as the first support/inflection; catalysts: CBRT/comments on policy, global risk sentiment, and Q1 earnings flow that will drive sector rotation.

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
Low-volatility, risk-on tape with narrow participation: Heavy Industry and select banks lead while Technology, Retail and Holdings lag. Trade cyclicals on strength, add selectively on pullbacks, and use CBRT/commentary and Q1 results as triggers to rotate exposures.
